channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Its full of junk and is at risk of vandalism/arson, 26th October
item.description:
The car has been outside my rented property for at least 4 months now without moving at all. Its registration plates are missing from the front and back, but there is a registration inside the car, drivers side dashboard, but it's for a different colour Toyota, specifically a white Toyota. And as you can see from the photos this Toyota is black. The car is full of what i can only describe as household waste/rubbish and unwanted home items. I've had to tell local teens to stay away from it when they've been lingering about it due to fear they will set it alight or vandalise it. I've asked around my neighbours and the car doesn't seem to belong to anyone in our street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walsham Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street litter bags often left by the bin at the Goodrich bus stop (outside 203 Barry Road). These are often left overnight., 26th October
item.description:
If these bags are left overnight it attracts foxes who open the bag and spread the rubbish over until street. This has happened for the last few weeks leaving the street littered with rubbish. These bags either need to be collected on the same day or secured so foxes cannot access them over night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 221, Barry Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Transit van, 26th October
item.description:
The van’s plates have been removed so it can’t be properly identified. It has not moved for over four months. The tyres are flat. It is taking up valuable parking space in Linton Close that is needed by residents who drive legally.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linton Close, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Request for clean-up: rubbish accumulation in central area, 26th October
item.description:
This area has become an unsightly dumping ground, with large amounts of litter, bottles, cans, and general waste piling up. It’s not only an eyesore in a busy town centre but also a health and safety hazard, damaging the environment. Immediate cleaning and ongoing monitoring are urgently needed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead High Street, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
